name: Heroz
description:
HEROZ is a FPS game with zombie and mutant.

You incarnate a super-soldier with many skill and weapon and will explore a secret military research center in a strange forest to resolve a experiment fail ...
For this project, I do all the programming and game design with some 3d modeling / texturing.

I use some asset package.

Trailer available on youtube : https://youtu.be/XucGHjBYqmE
Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/zAnZlZ

This is a prototype of this game, check the READ ME to know how to play
